build_stage.description: Represents the individual stages of the continuous delivery system that can be enabled / disabled at the build level

instance_type.description: List of supported AWS instance types - see https://aws.amazon.com/ec2/instance-types/

project_stage.description: Represents the individual stages of the continuous delivery system that can be enabled / disabled at the project level

config_project.description: Top level configuration for a project, including what builds and branches are covered and the current status (e.g. enabled, paused, etc.)

config_error.description: Used to indicate that there was a problem parsing the project configuration

branch.description: The name of the branch that we are actively monitoring, including any information needed for the initial deploy.

fields.name: initial_number_instances
fields.description: When first deploying this branch, the number of instances we create

fields.name: memory
fields.description: The number of MiB of memory to reserve for the container.

fields.name: port_container
fields.description: The port number on the container that is bound to the user-specified or automatically assigned host port.

fields.name: port_host
fields.description: The port number on the container instance to reserve for your container

fields.name: dependencies
fields.description: The names of other builds that this one is dependent on. If specified, we will ensure that we never scale this build to a tag that is ahead of the minimum version of the dependent application running in production.

fields.name: version
fields.description: The version of Delta to use for deployments. Defaults to 1.0 if not specified
